tool.name: CSP2 (Screening Mode)
tool.description: Screen query assemblies against reference assemblies
tool.command: mkdir -p queries references #set readext="" #for $reads in $query.coll #if $hasattr($reads, "is_of_type") and $reads.is_of_type("fasta") && ln -sf ${reads} 'queries/${reads.element_identifier}.fasta' #else if $reads.forward.is_of_type("fastq.gz","fastqsanger.gz") #set readext="fastq.gz" && ln -sf '${reads.forward}' 'queries/${reads.forward.element_identifier}_1.fastq.gz' && ln -sf '${reads.reverse}' 'queries/${reads.reverse.element_identifier}_2.fastq.gz' #else if $reads.forward.is_of_type("fastq.bz2", "fastqsanger.bz2") #set readext="fastq.bz2" && ln -sf '${reads.forward}' 'queries/${reads.forward.element_identifier}_1.fastq.bz2' && ln -sf '${reads.reverse}' 'queries/${reads.reverse.element_identifier}_2.fastq.bz2' #else #set readext="fastq" && ln -sf '${reads.forward}' 'queries/${reads.forward.element_identifier}_1.fastq' && ln -sf '${reads.reverse}' 'queries/${reads.reverse.element_identifier}_2.fastq' #end if #end for && echo "*** Files in queries directory: ***" && ls -lah queries/ && ln -sf '$source.reference' 'references/${source.reference.element_identifier}.fasta' && nextflow run ${__tool_directory__}/CSP2/CSP2.nf -profile csp2_galaxy --runmode screen #if $query.query_select == 'reads' --reads queries --readext $readext --forward "_1.${readext}" --reverse "_2.${readext}" #else --fasta queries #end if --ref_fasta 'references/${source.reference.element_identifier}.fasta' --min_cov $opt.min_cov --min_iden $opt.min_iden --min_len $opt.min_len --ref_edge $opt.ref_edge --query_edge $opt.query_edge --dwin $opt.dwin --wsnps $opt.wsnps --out CSP2_Screen_Output && echo "*** Files in output directory: ***" && ls -lah CSP2_Screen_Output && echo "*** Nextflow log follows: ***" && cat .nextflow.log

param.name: source_select
param.label: Use a curated GalaxyTrakr reference or a reference from your history
param.option: Use a reference from your history

validator.message: No assemblies are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: query_select
param.label: Screen a list of paired-end reads or a list of assemblies
param.option: Screen a list of paired reads

param.name: min_cov
param.label: Minimum reference genome coverage to proceed with distance estimation

param.name: min_iden
param.label: Minimum alignment percent identity to detect SNPs

param.name: min_len
param.label: Minimum alignment length to detect SNPs

param.name: ref_edge
param.label: Prune SNPs within this many bases of reference contig edge

param.name: query_edge
param.label: Prune SNPs within this many bases of query contig edge

param.name: dwin
param.label: Comma-separated set of window sizes for SNP density filtration (Set to 0 to disable density filtration)

param.name: wsnps
param.label: Comma-separated list of maximum SNP counts per density window

tool.help: This tool takes query assemblies and reference assemblies and calculates the pairwise distance between each query/reference combination. If no reference is provided, all queries are compared to all other queries.
